price: Monhwε na moansom (obiara) gyesε Onyankopͻn (nko ara). Nokorε sε, meyε kͻkͻbͻ ne anigyesԑm (ho somafoͻ) a me fri Ne hͻ ma mo:-
arabic: أَلَّا تَعۡبُدُوٓاْ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّنِي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ وَبَشِيرٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: allā taʿbudū illā al-laha innanī lakum min'hu nadhīrun wabashīrun
translations: and a bearer of glad tidings
